comments.body: I'd thought about copying this into `examples/plugins`, but decided to just reference this plugin where it currently is (under `tests/resources/mlflow-test-plugin`), as we actually run tests against this directory.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@    description="Test plugin for MLflow",
    packages=find_packages(),
    # Require MLflow as a dependency of the plugin, so that plugin users can simply install
    # the plugin & then immediately use it with MLflow
    install_requires=["mlflow"],
